reviews.review_msg: David is an amazing prof! He helps his students and he is very kind and understanding.

The course is awful, but he is not. I find him very kind and approachable. He is readily available during office hours and his criteria is very clear. Its not his fault FREN304, advanced French grammar, is a nightmare. He is definitely trying his best. There are like 8 quizzes, 3 homework assignments, 3 tests and a final so beware of that.
